message.body: I can't write
I felt compelled to try writing a pilot
And it's shit?
The tiny bit I have yeah
Good. If you thought it was awesome then we'd have an issue.
Are you stuck or do you just not like it?
It would be action based idk how to write it, my dialogue feels super weak I picture the scene perfect in my head but I leave like the scene details out
So can you write it like a novel instead?
But then it have to be adapted to a screenplay cuz fuck books
I guess
Hahahaha not necessarily... If you do most of it as a pilot but then just Steinbeck it out of what scenes you can picture perfectly. Ya know?
Hey man s'all about attitude. Don't fuckin pussy out.
I don't think my humor will be well received either
I like your humor.

I just wrote a scene where karl (the hero) ask if his new teammate died then Anthony (the sidekick) responds "he looks like he face planted into a wood chipper" and the two laugh and deem he was a nice guy and use his body as a human shield
Ok so it's not prime time material... But is it supposed to be? Tv is evolving and gay people can get married so the world is ready for some new, gritty, fucking take it or leave it gruesome shit.
Fuckin a
Can I ask a favor?
Anything
Can you just tell me to fuckin pull it together? I have 48 hours to complete an entire film from start to finish and everyone just keeps saying I'm awesome.
I'm dying.

Jen pull your shit the fuck together you're sounding like me and that's not awesome cuz Jenna MOTHERFUCKIN Yonker does two things she writes kickass movies and chews bubble gum, and you're all out of bubble gum lady
Love you Steve.
ï¿¼
